data.name: Don'tGetCaught
data.detailed_description:
Game background
The dark wheel covers the earth, all kinds of dark creatures come from the region, they occupy the world, the only remaining light guards hide in the shelter, waiting for the moment to fight back
Gameplay
There are multiple characters to choose from, choose your favorite character to enter the battlefield, and fight against a steady stream of regional creatures. Destroy them, get gold coins, keep improving yourself in the war, and win the final victory
Game Features
Hunting and killing enemies can get experience and gold coins. You can choose different equipment for each upgrade, with different gameplay, so that you can persist for as long as possible.
Accumulate gold coins to unlock careers or impose yourself to make you stronger and stronger, and can also be used to unlock different characters
Don't get caught by the enemy, or you will face terrible torture

data.short_description: A overlooking angle battle game, operate characters to avoid constant enemy attacks, collect gold coins and experience, choose different combinations from a variety of random weapons, and defeat the final enemy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: i5-8600T
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1660
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5-9400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2070
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: There will be some pornographic actions, exposing clothes, but there will be no obvious sexual organs
